page.title: 07PEOPLE AND JOBS
page.content:
AGE STRUCTURE In 1985 there were 195 people in Castle Carrock, divided by age as follows:- Pre-school Age 4 School age 28 Working Age 122 Pensionable 41
EMPLOYMENT Only 23 people found employment in the immediate village. Of the 8 in the Primary Sector, all were concerned with farming; there were none in the Secondary Sector; and 17 in the Service Sector, i.e. Public Houses, Shop, School and Church.
SOURCE OF EMPLOYMENT Within Castle Carrock .... 23 In Carlisle ............. 46 In Brampton .............. 7 Surrounding Area ......... 14 Travellers .............. 4 Yorkshire ............... 1
